import {Component} from '@angular/core'; import {AuthorizationService} from "../../service/authorization.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { constructor(public authorizationService: AuthorizationService) { } logOut() { this.authorizationService.logOut() } isLoggedIn(): boolean { return this.authorizationService.isLoggedIn(); } }
